name: Ioblocks
body:
Whether you're an teacher stirring the next generation of problem-solvers, a parent modeling STEM skills with your children or a Designer mocking-up your next awesomeness, we'll help you create the next generation of Internet connected Things.

### Modular
From USB powerbanks to wifi and html: No proprietary/fancy/cloudy connector protocol.
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/media.launchrock.com/assets/sites/site-cmz6h6pqyrhko3vbjq56aul0g/blocks/block-d8hkh1g1otwr83ivtrabr3jvp/ikptvc-screen%20shot%202015-06-05%20at%2009.10.59.png)

### Physical
Physical software! Available for kids from 4 years. Learn coding concepts without annoying syntax errors: away from the screen!
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/media.launchrock.com/assets/sites/site-cmz6h6pqyrhko3vbjq56aul0g/blocks/block-d8hkh1g1otwr83ivtrabr3jvp/itbdab-7epoh9-img_7167.jpg)

### Easy
Compatible with most construction toys sets (Oxford®, Lego®, mega-blocks®, meccano®..etc). You don't need to reinvent the wheel.
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/media.launchrock.com/assets/sites/site-cmz6h6pqyrhko3vbjq56aul0g/blocks/block-d8hkh1g1otwr83ivtrabr3jvp/6uvowt-screen%20shot%202015-06-05%20at%2009.28.54.png)


### Nota
Oxford®, Lego®, Mega-blocks®, Meccano® are trademarks and do not sponsor, authorize or endorse ioBlocks
